summary:
League of Legends, or *League*, is a popular video game where two teams of five players battle each other. It was made in 2009 by Riot Games. The game is set on a map where each team defends their base while trying to destroy the other team's. Players choose unique characters, called champions, and get stronger by earning points and buying items.

League has been very successful and is played by millions worldwide. It has lots of different game modes and even has its own professional gaming tournaments, making it one of the biggest esports.
title: League of Legends
